name: Revolutionary Army
description: A mysterious organization led by Monkey D. Dragon that opposes the World Government. While not explicitly named in this episode, Dragon's appearance and actions hint at the existence of this powerful group.

keyMoments.description: Dragon, the leader of the Revolutionary Army, makes his first appearance.
Dragon intervenes against the Marines to help Luffy escape.

significance: The Revolutionary Army is introduced through Dragon's appearance, hinting at a major force opposing the World Government that will play a crucial role in the series.
